name: 林益辰
objective: 本課程在於使同學瞭解管理思想的演進，與管理有關之重要理論，以及未來管理之發展趨勢。課程主要內容包括：組織與管理、管理哲學、管理思想的演進、管理功能（規畫、領導、組織、控制、評估）、溝通、組織成長與改變、未來之管理、個案研討。
schedule:
Week 1:Class policy introduction
Week 2: ch 1. Managers and management
Week 3: ch 2. The management environment
Week 4: ch 3. Foundations of planning
Week 5: ch 4. Foundations of decision making
Week 6: ch 5. Basic organization design
Week 7: ch 6. Staffing and human resource management
Week 8: Quiz-1 & review
Week 9: Midterm exam.
Week 10: ch 7. Managing change, stress, and innovation
Week 11: ch 8. Foundations of individual and group behavior
Week 12: ch 9. Understanding work teams
Week 13: ch 10. Motivating and rewarding employees
Week 14: ch 11. Leadingship and trust
Week 15: ch 12. Communication and interpersonal skills
Week 16: ch 13. Foundations of control
Week 17: Quiz-2 & Review
Week 18: Final
scorePolicy:
Participation and Attendance 10%
Paper reading report: 15%
Quiz: 20%
Class Exercises and Group Presentation: 15%
Midterm Exam.: 20%
Final: 20%
materials:
1. 當代管理學，榮泰生編譯，Contemporary Management, 5e, Gareth R. Jones, Jennifer M. George, McGraw Hill
2. Contemporary Management, 5e, Gareth R. Jones, Jennifer M. George, McGraw Hill
3.Handouts and readings
